`r Spp` off the coast of California was assessed as two separate sub-stocks split at Point Conception. However, the stock status for management decisions was based on combined estimates of stock size and status from both of the California area assessments. The combined stock status in 2021 of `r spp` in California was 31.7 percent. The spawning output by area and summed across California along with the relative spawning outputs for each area are provided in Table \ref{tab:ca-ssb-status}.
